message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident you'll find this a fair offer.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. While I appreciate your interest, $12,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,250. I believe this reflects a fair compromise.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,250. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,750. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I can tell you're serious about the product.  My bottom line is $13,000.  Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit away from $13,000. I'm willing to go up to $12,800. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.
